page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content: After conducting a survey on the rural population in this area we found the {majority}of inhabitants were between the age of{16-65}and were connected to the{farming industry.}Those who were not, tended to live in larger more expensive housing whereas small farm cottages are inhabited by farm hands. The short distances travelled does not entail a dependence on motorised transport. The majority either travel on{foot or cycle}to their place of work. The{commuting section}of the community are mainly engaged in job activities in the{urban section}of {Aberdeen. Due to a small population the demand for shopping facilities was limited therefore{everyday goods}were bought in{Ellon,}whereas{specialised goods were bought in{Aberdeen.
